body.name: SHA CERLIN Full Bed Frame with Headboard, Heavy Duty Platform Bed with Under-Bed Storage, Solid Metal Construction, No Box Spring Needed, Easy Assembly, Black Oak
features: Upgraded Foundation: The support structure is optimized to allow effortless installation while enhancing stability, durability, and extending the life of your mattress.
Noise-Free: EVA sponge and mute buckles to prevent the slats from friction and making noise. Provide you with a quiet sleeping environment.
Extra Storage Space: The 12.4" height clearance of the frame allows for easy under-bed storage for your stuff and is also easy to clean.
No Box Spring Needed: Reliable and closely spaced slats are designed to support and extend the life of your memory foam or spring mattress without the need for a box spring.
Easy Assembly: Everything you need is in one package, of course, including detailed instructions. It only takes 30 minutes to install this bed frame, even if you are a rookie.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sleek black, sturdy and easy to assemble!
reviews.reviewText: Perfect! My son loves his new bedroom furniture. The bed is just as pictured. Packaged well arrived with no damage. I was surprised how heavy the package was. I had to drag and slide it into my house then unpackaged and carried it upstairs piece by piece to assemble. All parts were included along with the 2 tools needed to assemble. It assembles easily with 2 people. The picture instructions could be clearer but we figured it out. Very pleased and would recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and Strong
reviews.reviewText: Simple, classic, sturdy, and strong. Looks very nice with the right bedding. This was a rushed choice, and it did not disappoint.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a wonderful bed frame! It's not too heavy, so transportation was easy. It's very sturdy and easy to assemble, coming with simple instructions and extra pieces. It doesn't squeak or shake when doing non-sleeping activities, which is a big plus. And it's nice and affordable!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars How to construct without needing any extra parts:
reviews.reviewText: Okay. So I was a little worried about buying this since the other reviews stated they needed to order an extra part. I definitely agree the manufacturer should make the middle 'I' beams shorter so there is no confusion. However, it is possible to put this bed together well without needing customer service to send another part. This is how I did it:Do not screw the perimeter platform screws in all of the way. I think these are 'G' and 'H'. Let them be loose. Then when everything is put together, you will be able to get G and H into the holes and tighten them. But if you put the bed together as the instructions say by tightening the I parts last, it won't work because the center part is too long when the side parts are screwed in all the way. I was able to put the bed together and thought maybe I would have to bend something but the bed went together perfectly (with a little muscle) and the end beams tightened up fine after I already put the center beam in. It doesn't need to be that confusing but it is and it is a relatively easy workaround and saved me having to call or do anything else. I had the bed put together by myself in less than an hour. And I've been sleeping on it for 3 weeks now with no issues. It doesn't creak and it feels very sturdy. I did hit my leg on the end but I always do that on beds with footboards.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy. Inexpensive. Perfect.
reviews.reviewText: It’s sturdy. Put together easy and fast. Had it for a year now and I’m still so happy. There’s also plenty of space for those carts with wheels to go under the bed for extra storage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Happy with my new bed
reviews.reviewText: Looks great, very sturdy and great storage underneath. The small footboard allows the mattress to stay in place. It took about an hour to put together and was relatively easy. All in all happy with my purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Inexpensive but sturdy and clear assembly instructions
reviews.reviewText: After paying over $1,000 for a Room and Board bed frame that broke after a few years I took a chance on this frame. Package was heavy/dragged it in my house but it was surprisingly easy to assemble with the instructions given. I could do it myself in about an hour, with two people it would take less time. The pieces anre not flimsy metal and the frame is as sturdy as the Room and Board frame (costing 5x more) whose joints collapsed on me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars VERY STURDY AND EASY TO ASSEMBLE
reviews.reviewText: My husband I were needing a new frame with headboard and foot board, but didn't want to spend a ton of money. We have a very small room so we needed something that would not take up a lot of space. This bed is very sturdy! everything came wrapped in cellophane, no damage. It came with all the tools needed to assemble and the instructions were very easy to follow. I was able to put it together my self in about 45 minutes. Two people would be much quicker for when you have to hold a piece up to attach it to the frame. The frame weighs about 75 lbs. We only have our mattress, and put the bed on risers to have storage space underneath. It hasn't moved an inch! We are very pleased with this bed! !
